name: CP_2_3_Render_Emergency_Medical_System_Originated_Data
title: CP.2.3 Render Emergency Medical System Originated Data (Function)
description: Render emergency medical data that has been captured from multiple external sources.
purpose: Emergency medical data relevant to the patient record can be captured from many external sources and should be rendered appropriately alongside other information in the patient record.

statement.label: CP.2.3#01
statement.requirement: IF the system conforms to function [[CPS.2.3]] (Support Emergency Medical System Originated Data), THEN the system SHALL provide the ability to render Emergency Medical System Originated Data.
